summary: Adds impulse (salt‑and‑pepper) noise to an image by randomly turning a configurable fraction of pixels to the maximum intensity (salt) or to zero (pepper), with independent control over total noise amount, salt‑to‑pepper ratio, and application probability.
business_intent: Enhance training data variability and model robustness by simulating real‑world impulse noise in image datasets for computer‑vision applications.
